name: Ropu Barastu No X
description:
The Ultimate Evil has stolen the hearts of the most powerful women across time and space. Earn SCORE by destroying their ships and building COMBO before unleashing the ROPU BARASTU BEAM. Impress each girl with enough SCORE TO SCORE a special scene with her.

  • Intense Bullet Hell Gameplay
  • Chain-based scoring system
  • Earn SCORE to SCORE with your favorite girls
  • Scene unlocks for every girl
  • Gallery mode
  • MAKE PANTIES DROP!
